entities.name: deluminator
entities.description: The Deluminator is a magical object that can be used to remove and replace street lamps. It was mentioned as being clicked again by the narrator.

entities.name: blue light
entities.description: A blue light came out of the Deluminator when it was clicked again. This is a physical phenomenon that occurred in the story.

entities.name: woods
entities.description: The narrator arrived in these woods after Disapparating from somewhere else. The location is mentioned as being where they ended up.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry was one of the people who showed themselves to the narrator. He is a person and a character in the story.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another person who showed herself to the narrator. She is a character in the story and has a conversation with the narrator.

entities.name: silver doe
entities.description: The silver doe was seen by the narrator before Harry appeared. It is an animal that is mentioned as being involved in the story.

entities.name: sword in the pool
entities.description: A sword was found in a pool after the silver doe led them to it. This is an object and a plot point in the story.

relationships.description: The Deluminator emitted a blue light when clicked again.
The silver doe led them to the sword in the pool.
